Sentencas: Design of an SOFC for both high internal heat and high electrical power generation at reduced electrical efficiency results in a SOFCR, solid oxide fuel cell reformer.
Titulo: Innovative concepts for the coproduction of electricity and syngas with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The high-temperature heat is used mainly for internal reforming of natural gas.
Titulo: Innovative concepts for the coproduction of electricity and syngas with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This new combined production of electrical energy and hydrogen-rich syngas is much more efficient than separate production.
Titulo: Innovative concepts for the coproduction of electricity and syngas with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The most important applications are the supply of the chemical industry with electricity and hydrogen, and the use for on-site Fewer generation in conjunction with PEM fuel cells.
Titulo: Innovative concepts for the coproduction of electricity and syngas with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of thermodynamic calculations, particularly in the range of low cell voltages, are confirmed by experimental studies and modeling calculations.
Titulo: Innovative concepts for the coproduction of electricity and syngas with solid oxide fuel cells
